name: LiveScience
text: RT @LiveScience: Scientists condemn racism and take action with #StrikeforBlackLives this week https://t.co/R4K270oQy7 https://t.co/5FlGHHl7BL

name: LiveScience
text: RT @LiveScience: Mysterious deep-space flashes repeat every 157 days https://t.co/zXPlrt2g4x https://t.co/zd3VUG71W5

name: LiveScience
text:
#ShutDownSTEM #ShutDownAcademia calls for scientists to cancel their meetings to discuss ways to take action against racism.

Live Science stands in solidarity with the black community against racism and we support all who peacefully express #solidarity:

https://t.co/8vHUFxa3Cp https://t.co/p5DUJj1JdA

name: LiveScience
text:
RT @airandspace: When we share the story of the Tuskegee Airmen, the deeply hateful racism they faced from white officers, and their activism to overcome it, often goes untold. We must do better in telling those stories. 

A new blog explores the resistance they faced: https://t.co/PZ9rcLYg8y https://t.co/h2l92oY9Hx
